metadata.title: CVE-2018-19200 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.0. UriCommon.c allowsattempted operations on NULL input via a uriResetUri* function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19200` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liburiparser1 - 0.8.4-1ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: uriparser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.4-1ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1').
